description:
'''Karl Johan Schuster''' ({{IPA|sv|ˈjûːan ˈɧʏ̌sːtɛr}}; born 1 February 1985), known professionally as '''Shellback''', is a Swedish record producer and songwriter. He was listed as the No. 1 producer of 2012 on ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' magazine's year end chart, and he also topped the list of their "Top 10 Songwriters Airplay Chart" the same year; he has won four [[Grammy Awards]].

Shellback initially started his career as a [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] guitarist before transitioning into pop music production and songwriting.

Shellback regularly collaborates with songwriter [[Max Martin]] and together they have produced, written, or co-written songs for various artists such as [[Pink (singer)|P!nk]], [[Taylor Swift]], [[Adam Lambert]], [[Britney Spears]], [[Usher (entertainer)|Usher]], [[Avril Lavigne]], [[Ariana Grande]], [[Adele]] and [[Maroon 5]]. Shellback has also collaborated with fellow producer [[Benny Blanco]] and has produced songs by himself, including "[[Want U Back]]" by [[Cher Lloyd]] and "[[Animals (Maroon 5 song)|Animals]]" by Maroon 5. He co-wrote and co-produced the song "[[Can't Stop the Feeling!]]" along with Martin and [[Justin Timberlake]] for the animated film ''[[Trolls (film)|Trolls]]'' (2016), earning a nomination for the [[Academy Award for Best Original Song]] in 2017.
